body: @kids-return, what exactly is your problem? Can you describe it? If its about the multiple lines that are added, that typically has to do with your console not supporting TTY.
I saw the cursor. I once experienced a cursor like this inside a non tty console
Hmm... well, I'm not sure what the problem is either. He's changing value and position of the cursor changes as well... @kids-return could you elaborate?

I am afraid its because of your DOS console. The same behavior will happen in the PhpStorm console. On the contrary, more advanced consoles like linux systems  support it. However, I am surprised to see this behavior in the new console of Windows 10. How are you using Windows 10? Virtualbox? Docker?

My office computer is windows 10, not DOCKER and Virtualbox.
The console is windows 10 by default
I think the windows console there is this problem.

perhabs you could try something like this:
http://www.howtogeek.com/249966/how-to-install-and-use-the-linux-bash-shell-on-windows-10/
